metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2013-0521 -- pam security, bug fix, and enhancement update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[1.1.1-13] - fix environment file handling problems - CVE-2011-3148 (#746619) and CVE-2011-3148 (#746620)
[1.1.1-12] - add character sequence test to pam_cracklib - drop unused difignore option from pam_cracklib (#811243) - add enforce_for_root option to pam_cracklib (#588893) - mention limits.d in the limits.conf(5) manpage (#723297) - add ability to lock out inactive accounts to pam_lastlog - fix require_selinux option in pam_namespace (#750601) - add mntopts flag for tmpfs polyinstantiation method - preserve authtok_type in pam_get_authtok() (#811168) - fix username mismatch in pam_unix remember feature (#815516) - relax restriction of root in pam_pwhistory - relax soft nproc limit for root in 90-nproc.conf
[1.1.1-11] - additional password checks in pam_cracklib
